00109 // PROGRAM NAME
00110 char *prgname;
00111 
00112 // opt args
00113 extern char *optarg;
00114 extern int optind, opterr, optopt;
00115 
00116 void
00117 usage(void)
00118 {
00119         fprintf(stderr,
00120         "USAGE: %s [options] http_links...\n"
00121         "OPTIONS:\n"
00122         "-c or --chunks=num\n"
00123         "     Downloads every http link in num chunks. (default is one chunk)\n"
00124         "-R or --resultdir=dir\n"
00125         "     Result directory (where files will be downloaded,"
00126         "default is current directory).\n", prgname);
00127         exit(1);
00128 }
00129 
00130 static struct option longopts[] =
00131         {
00132                 { "chunks", required_argument, NULL, 'c' },
00133                 { "result-dir", required_argument, NULL, 'R' },
00134 //              { "sock-ipv6", no_argument, NULL, '6' }
00135         };
00136 
00137 // application local settings
00138 prgstx programsettings;
00139 
00140 void
00141 proc_opts(int argc, char **argv)
00142 {
00143         int optlen = 2 * length(longopts) + 1;
00144         char optstring[optlen];
00145 
00146         int ridx, idx;
00147         int opt;
00148 
00149         // number of files
00150         int linknum, linkidx;
00151 
00152         memset(optstring, 0, optlen);
00153 
00154         // programsettings init
00155         programsettings.chunks = D_CHUNKS;
00156         programsettings.resultdir = D_RESULT_DIR;
00157         programsettings.numlinks = 0;
00158         programsettings.links = NULL;
00159         programsettings.ipv6 = 0;
00160 
00161         // optstring init
00162         for (idx = 0, ridx = 0; idx != length(longopts); ++idx, ++ridx) {
00163                 assert(ridx < optlen);
00164 
00165                 optstring[ridx] = longopts[idx].val;
00166                 if (longopts[idx].has_arg == required_argument)
00167                         optstring[++ridx] = ':';
00168         }
00169 
00170         while ((opt =
00171                 getopt_long(argc, argv, optstring, longopts, NULL)) != -1) {
00172                 switch (opt) {
00173                 case 'c':
00174                         if ((programsettings.chunks = atoi(optarg)) <= 0) {
00175                                 fprintf(
00176                                 stderr, "number of chunks must be a number\n");
00177                                 exit(1);
00178                         }
00179                         break;
00180                 case 'R':
00181                         programsettings.resultdir = optarg;
00182                         break;
00183 //              case '6':
00184                         // # define HTTP_IPV6_SOCKS
00185                         // programsettings.ipv6 = 1;
00186 //                      break;
00187                 case '?':
00188                         fprintf(stderr, "unrecognized option: -%c\n", optopt);
00189                         usage();
00190                         break;
00191                 default:
00192                         break;
00193                 }
00194         }
00195 
00196         argv += optind;
00197 
00198         linknum = argc - optind;
00199 
00200         if (linknum == 0) {
00201                 fprintf(stderr, "there was no link in parameters");
00202                 usage();
00203         }
00204 
00205 //      printf("num of http_links: %d\n", linknum);
00206 
00207         programsettings.numlinks = linknum;
00208         programsettings.links = malloc(linknum * sizeof (char *) + 1);
00209 
00210         linkidx = 0;
00211 
00212         while (*(argv)) {
00213 //              printf("link nr%d: %s\n", linkidx, *argv);
00214                 programsettings.links[linkidx++] = *argv;
00215                 ++argv;
00216         }
00217         programsettings.links[linkidx] = NULL;
00218 }
00219 
00220 int
00221 main(int argc, char **argv)
00222 {
00223         prgname = argv[0];
00224 
00225         if (argc < 2)
00226                 usage();
00227 
00228         proc_opts(argc, argv);
00229 
00230         thr_mgr_downloadallfiles(&programsettings);
00231 
00232         return (0);
00233 }
